Definitions_and_Glossary.section_text:
"Asset Pool" refers to the aggregated set of real estate or credit assets pledged under this Agreement.

"Operating Covenant"
Minimum DSCR of 1.20x must be maintained across the pooled asset cash flows.

"Strategic Event"
Any sale, merger, recapitalization, asset disposal (> 8% NAV), or restructuring requiring consent.

clauses.clause_text:
"Operating Covenant"
Minimum DSCR of 1.20x must be maintained across the pooled asset cash flows.

"Strategic Event"
Any sale, merger, recapitalization, asset disposal (> 8% NAV), or restructuring requiring consent.

Definitions_and_Glossary.section_text:
"Eligible Collateral"
Assets meeting: (i) audit-verified book value, (ii) enforceable ownership rights, (iii) liquidation horizon < 14 months.

"Restricted Party"
Entities under sanction lists, AML-flagged entities, or beneficial owners obscured through undisclosed nominee arrangements.

clauses.clause_text:
"Eligible Collateral"
Assets meeting: (i) audit-verified book value, (ii) enforceable ownership rights, (iii) liquidation horizon < 14 months.

"Restricted Party"
Entities under sanction lists, AML-flagged entities, or beneficial owners obscured through undisclosed nominee arrangements.

Definitions_and_Glossary.section_text:
Valuation Method
NAV shall be measured quarterly using discounted future cash flows with a 10.5% hurdle.

clauses.clause_text:
Valuation Method
NAV shall be measured quarterly using discounted future cash flows with a 10.5% hurdle.

Security_Package_Schedule.section_text:
Primary Collateral
Mortgage charge over revenue-producing assets located in Bengaluru, Pune, and Hyderabad.

Secondary Collateral
Pledge of receivables, reserve accounts, and escrow-controlled operating accounts.

clauses.clause_text:
Primary Collateral
Mortgage charge over revenue-producing assets located in Bengaluru, Pune, and Hyderabad.

Secondary Collateral
Pledge of receivables, reserve accounts, and escrow-controlled operating accounts.

Security_Package_Schedule.section_text:
Trigger Events
Failure to satisfy covenant tests for 2 consecutive quarters constitutes an Enforcement Trigger.

Enforcement Mechanics
Upon trigger: cash sweeps activated, disbursement controls initiated, asset sales prioritized by liquidity yield.

clauses.clause_text:
Trigger Events
Failure to satisfy covenant tests for 2 consecutive quarters constitutes an Enforcement Trigger.

Enforcement Mechanics
Upon trigger: cash sweeps activated, disbursement controls initiated, asset sales prioritized by liquidity yield.

Security_Package_Schedule.section_text:
Quarterly Reporting
Reports include asset cashflow summaries, impairment tests, LTV updates, and asset-level breakage reports.

clauses.clause_text:
Quarterly Reporting
Reports include asset cashflow summaries, impairment tests, LTV updates, and asset-level breakage reports.
